title: Mayura Jhumka: Emerald Cascades in Gold and Diamonds
materials: Ruby accent stone. Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas showcase a meticulously crafted peacock (Mayura) motif, studded with sparkling Polki diamonds and accented with a ruby. The emerald bead tassels cascade gracefully, culminating in delicate clusters of natural pearls. The dome-shaped top is reminiscent of temple jewelry architecture. The setting is skillfully done to maximize the brilliance of each diamond and the vibrancy of the emeralds.
colors: and a delicate touch of red from the ruby accent. The natural pearls provide a soft
occasions: or a sophisticated evening event. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: These Jhumkas seamlessly blend traditional South Indian design with a contemporary aesthetic. The intricate peacock design symbolizes beauty and grace, while the high-quality emeralds represent prosperity and good fortune. Crafted with exceptional attention to detail and utilizing time-honored techniques, these earrings are not only visually stunning but also built to last. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant shine. A timeless piece that will be treasured for generations.
